notesStmt.note: Defective at the beginning and at the end. Margins as well as first and last few folios much damaged. Lacuna after folio 2.
Additional comments in different handwriting are found throughout in the margins.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A daily prayer book according to the German rite, with a commentary.

Prayers for Rosh ha-Shanah and Yom Kipur

collation.p: Indeterminable (too tightly bound). Catchwords at the end of the quires, nearly entirely cut away.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi square and semi-cursive script, partially punctuated, of the 13th to 14th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Tephilloth, with Comm. of El'azar of Worms. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 27,556.'
